sqlMap.sql: select * from tbl_book t order by t.bid
SELECT t.bid, t.b_name, t.author, t.country, t.age, t.pub_date, t.pub_house, t2.description as type, t.rectime FROM tbl_book t, tbl_book_type t2 where t.type = t2.t_no and t.bid = :bid;
update tbl_book t set t.b_name = ?, t.author = ?, t.country = ?, t.age = ?, t.pub_date = ?, t.pub_house = ?, t.type = ? where t.bid = ?
